analyzed: vaṃ kāram vajra sattvam ca vajrāsana sadā āsthitam
vāruṇa maṇḍala vyāpi vairocana namaḥ astu te  /
akāram ādi svabhāvam ākāśe vyāpitam tathā
arka nīla samaḥ tejaḥ akṣobhya śrī namaḥ astu te
rakāram lakṣmī svabhāvam nānā ratnam anekadhā

original: raṃ vyāpitaṃ ca pṛthvīṃ ratnasaṃbhava namo'stu te || 3 ||
analyzed: raṃ vyāpitam ca pṛthvīm ratna saṃbhava namaḥ astu te  /
akāram asthiram bhāvam padma nāga sama prabham
agni tejaḥ samādhi stham amita ābha namaḥ astu te  /
akāram tad svabhāvam ca gandhavāha sama prabham
akāra viśva vajram ca amodha siddhi namaḥ astu te  /

original: dhātvaṣṭakaṃ kīrtitaṃ ca dharmadhātu namo'stu te || 6 ||
analyzed: dhātu aṣṭakam kīrtitam ca dharmadhātu namaḥ astu te
sakāram sarva sampattiḥ sarva maṅgalam arthanam
sarva siddhiḥ tvam eva atha siddhi vajra namaḥ astu te
